meanings.definition: The state or quality of being crisp.
meanings.sent1: The crispness of the apple made it enjoyable to bite into.
meanings.sent2: I love the crispness of freshly washed lettuce in a salad.
meanings.sent3: The crispness of the potato chip was so satisfying, it made me want more.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a crispness to it that cut through the noise of the room.
meanings.sent5: The crispness of the winter air filled my lungs with a refreshing chill.

meanings.definition: A pleasing firmness and freshness in food.
meanings.sent1: The salad's crispness came from the crunchy cucumbers and bell peppers.
meanings.sent2: The crispness of the bread added a delightful texture to the sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The crispness of the carrot was so unexpected, it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crispness of the lettuce in the burger gave it a satisfying crunch.
meanings.sent5: The crispness of the apple pie crust made each bite a delicious experience.
